Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the mailing of credit card applications to persons under twenty-one years of age
Summary: Prohibits the mailing of credit card applications to persons under twenty-one years of age except when requested; provides for a penalty of no more than one thousand dollars per violation.
LawCode: Amd ยง520, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting mailing of credit card applications to persons under twenty-one years of age
